overview.en: Pig coin,short for PC, focuses on community consensus. By establishing a small community and forming a large community, pigs can be widely circulated. Members can get PC by participating in community management and activities.
overview.zh: 猪猪币,简称：PC,以社区共识为重心,通过建立一个个小的社群,组成大社区,使猪猪广泛流通,成员可以通过参与社区管理和活动获得PC.
